trans-unit.target: TEXT_LUCKMC106_03327_SEQ_00<tab>Runar has more work to be done.
TEXT_LUCKMC106_03327_TODO_00<tab>Look around at the destination.
TEXT_LUCKMC106_03327_TODO_01<tab>Defeat the sin eater.
TEXT_LUCKMC106_03327_TODO_02<tab>Speak with Minfilia.
TEXT_LUCKMC106_03327_TODO_03<tab>Search for the jade heartstone.
TEXT_LUCKMC106_03327_TODO_04<tab>Show the jade heartstone to Minfilia.
TEXT_LUCKMC106_03327_TODO_05<tab>Deliver the jade heartstone to Runar.
TEXT_LUCKMC106_03327_RYNE_000_000<tab>Hmmm...
TEXT_LUCKMC106_03327_RUNAR_000_010<tab>Done tending to the crops already?
TEXT_LUCKMC106_03327_RUNAR_000_011<tab>Very good. It should not be long before your room is ready.
TEXT_LUCKMC106_03327_MANOFNIGHT03326_000_012<tab>Runar!
TEXT_LUCKMC106_03327_MANOFNIGHT03326_000_013<tab>In the woods... <pant> <pant> Sin eaters. I fear they may have the touch.
TEXT_LUCKMC106_03327_RUNAR_000_014<tab>Where!?
TEXT_LUCKMC106_03327_MANOFNIGHT03326_000_015<tab>In the grove to the southwest. For a mercy, they've yet to wander any closer to Slitherbough.
TEXT_LUCKMC106_03327_RUNAR_000_016<tab>Then we have no need to engage. Inform the guard that no one is to set foot outside the village until they have moved on.
TEXT_LUCKMC106_03327_MANOFNIGHT03326_000_017<tab>But sir, what of Toddia's heartstone?
TEXT_LUCKMC106_03327_MANOFNIGHT03326_000_018<tab>It must be retrieved before the service.
TEXT_LUCKMC106_03327_RUNAR_000_019<tab>Of all the times for sin eaters to appear...
TEXT_LUCKMC106_03327_RYNE_000_020<tab>Are you just going to leave them alone?

TEXT_LUCKMC106_03327_RUNAR_000_021<tab>Under normal circumstances, we would not hesitate in striking the beasts down. But if they indeed have the touch, I will not risk them corrupting one of our own.
TEXT_LUCKMC106_03327_RYNE_000_022<tab>What was that you said about a stone?
TEXT_LUCKMC106_03327_MANOFNIGHT03326_000_023<tab>A few days past, Toddia, a child of the Night's Blessed, was slain by the sin eaters.
TEXT_LUCKMC106_03327_MANOFNIGHT03326_000_024<tab>We succeeded in retrieving her body, but in our haste, we failed to notice her necklace was gone.

TEXT_LUCKMC106_03327_MANOFNIGHT03326_000_025<tab>Strung to it was a pendant of jade─her heartstone. All of the Night's Blessed are given such a stone at birth. It is the most valuable possession one can own.
TEXT_LUCKMC106_03327_MANOFNIGHT03326_000_026<tab>It is custom to present the heartstone of the deceased at their funeral, as an offering to the heavens. But now...
TEXT_LUCKMC106_03327_RYNE_000_027<tab>What if... What if I could find it for you?
TEXT_LUCKMC106_03327_RYNE_000_028<tab>I have experience fighting sin eaters. And the Light's...corruption does not touch me like it does others.
TEXT_LUCKMC106_03327_RUNAR_000_029<tab>Master Matoya called you Minfilia, did she not? Are you truly <var 1A 02 /var>the<var 1A 01 /var> Minfilia? Descended from the Oracle?
TEXT_LUCKMC106_03327_RUNAR_000_030<tab>Even so, I dare not ask you to risk your life for the Blessed.
TEXT_LUCKMC106_03327_RYNE_000_031<tab>I understand how you feel, but I can't stand by knowing that your people are in need and I can help. Please, let me do this.
TEXT_LUCKMC106_03327_RUNAR_000_032<tab>Very well. But if the danger proves too great, you must retreat. I could never forgive myself if we were forced to hold a second service.
TEXT_LUCKMC106_03327_RYNE_000_033<tab><gasp> I nearly forgot about Thancred. What if he returns before I do?
TEXT_LUCKMC106_03327_Q1_000_000<tab>What will you say?
TEXT_LUCKMC106_03327_A1_000_001<tab>Don't worry. I'll come with you.
TEXT_LUCKMC106_03327_A1_000_002<tab>Thancred doesn't need to know.
TEXT_LUCKMC106_03327_RYNE_000_034<tab>Thank you. With you at my side, I'm certain we can deal with them in no time at all.
TEXT_LUCKMC106_03327_RYNE_000_035<tab>Wh-What!? Do you mean to say...you'll come with me?
TEXT_LUCKMC106_03327_RYNE_000_036<tab>Thank you. Let's hurry then, before he returns.
TEXT_LUCKMC106_03327_RUNAR_000_037<tab>Go swiftly, and may the shadows keep you both.
TEXT_LUCKMC106_03327_RUNAR_000_040<tab>Do not be reckless. We would be glad to have her heartstone returned to us, but it is not worth both of your lives.
TEXT_LUCKMC106_03327_MANOFNIGHT03326_000_045<tab>Please, I beg of you. We must have that gem.
TEXT_LUCKMC106_03327_RYNE_000_050<tab>It should be around here somewhere, I think.
TEXT_LUCKMC106_03327_RYNE_000_060<tab>There! The sin eaters!
TEXT_LUCKMC106_03327_RYNE_000_061<tab>I was hoping there would only be one...
TEXT_LUCKMC106_03327_RYNE_000_062<tab>There's no way we can search for the stone without dealing with them first.
TEXT_LUCKMC106_03327_Q2_000_000<tab>What will you say?
TEXT_LUCKMC106_03327_A2_000_001<tab>Let's get to it, then!
TEXT_LUCKMC106_03327_A2_000_002<tab>Perhaps we should split them up.
TEXT_LUCKMC106_03327_A2_000_003<tab>What do you propose we do?
TEXT_LUCKMC106_03327_RYNE_000_063<tab>What? Shouldn't we make a plan first?
TEXT_LUCKMC106_03327_RYNE_000_064<tab>Though...there are only two.
TEXT_LUCKMC106_03327_RYNE_000_065<tab>I'll draw one of them away. You can deal with the other.
TEXT_LUCKMC106_03327_RYNE_000_066<tab>Good idea. I'll draw one away while you handle the other.
TEXT_LUCKMC106_03327_RYNE_000_067<tab>Fighting them together here would make a lot of noise, which might attract beasts or other eaters...
TEXT_LUCKMC106_03327_RYNE_000_068<tab>But if we fought them separately and quietly, we might not have to worry about that.
TEXT_LUCKMC106_03327_RYNE_000_069<tab>All right, then. I'll draw one away while you handle the other.
TEXT_LUCKMC106_03327_RYNE_000_080<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. <pant> <pant> There you are.
TEXT_LUCKMC106_03327_RYNE_000_081<tab>It's done. Though, I fear I was a bit careless. I'll do better next time, I promise.
TEXT_LUCKMC106_03327_RYNE_000_082<tab>I... I'm fine. You needn't worry about me. More importantly, we have to find that heartstone.
TEXT_LUCKMC106_03327_RYNE_000_083<tab>They said it was made of jade, right? I'll search over there in the brush.
TEXT_LUCKMC106_03327_RYNE_000_090<tab>It must be here somewhere.
TEXT_LUCKMC106_03327_SYSTEM_000_100<tab>There seems to be no trace of the heartstone here.
TEXT_LUCKMC106_03327_SYSTEM_000_101<tab>You brush away the leaves and uncover a brilliant green gem.
TEXT_LUCKMC106_03327_RYNE_000_110<tab>Did you have any luck?
TEXT_LUCKMC106_03327_RYNE_000_111<tab>It's beautiful! This has to be it.
TEXT_LUCKMC106_03327_RYNE_000_112<tab>...You know, Thancred always said you were a <var 08 E905 ((woman)) ((man)) /var> of many talents, and I think I'm beginning to understand what he meant.
TEXT_LUCKMC106_03327_RYNE_000_113<tab>I have much to learn if I'm to be even half the hero you are.
TEXT_LUCKMC106_03327_RYNE_000_114<tab>The hero she was...
TEXT_LUCKMC106_03327_RYNE_000_115<tab>Ah, I'm sorry. Forget I said anything.
TEXT_LUCKMC106_03327_RYNE_000_116<tab>We should hurry back to Slitherbough. Runar and the others are probably worried.
TEXT_LUCKMC106_03327_RYNE_000_120<tab>Thancred, I can explain.
TEXT_LUCKMC106_03327_THANCRED_000_125<tab>Well? Out with it, then.
TEXT_LUCKMC106_03327_RUNAR_000_130<tab>Thank goodness you are safe. I had begun to fear the worst.
TEXT_LUCKMC106_03327_RUNAR_000_131<tab>By all that is dark, you found it!
TEXT_LUCKMC106_03327_RUNAR_000_132<tab>We can proceed with her service as planned.
TEXT_LUCKMC106_03327_RUNAR_000_133<tab>These blessed gems serve not only to protect us in life, but to guide our spirits unto the sunless sea in the hereafter.
TEXT_LUCKMC106_03327_RUNAR_000_134<tab>Even should we be felled by the sin eaters, so long as these gems are recovered, our souls are ensured peace in the dark.
